attributes.action: stop wishing English teams well in sporting events as it invariably ends up meaning they lose
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whenever the Prime Minister wishes an English team well in a sporting event, they usually end up losing.

This is known as "the Jonah effect".

If the Prime Minister openly supported opposition teams, English teams would stand more of a chance of winning.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
